data.lyric:
[ti:Heartless (Explicit)]
[ar:Diplo/Morgan Wallen]
[al:Heartless (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Heartless (Explicit) - Diplo/Morgan Wallen
[00:00.43]Lyrics by：Morgan Wallen/Thomas Wesley Pentz/Henry Agincourt Allen/Ernest Keith Smith/Ryan Hurd/Ryan Vojtesak
[00:00.86]Composed by：Morgan Wallen/Thomas Wesley Pentz/Henry Agincourt Allen/Ernest Keith Smith/Ryan Hurd/Ryan Vojtesak
[00:01.30]Heartless
[00:05.26]So heartless
[00:09.44]Say you goin' out late
[00:11.59]I count down till you call me
[00:13.74]It's just one of those things
[00:15.85]That you do when you're lonely
[00:18.03]And you're all about the chase
[00:20.19]But you won't ever let me catch you
[00:22.27]And I wish I was the same
[00:24.42]But I know I'm gonna let you
[00:25.92]Win again and when I do
[00:27.85]It's gonna hurt like hell
[00:29.48]And you don't mean to
[00:30.98]That's what I tell myself
[00:32.98]But why you gotta be so heartless
[00:35.43]I know you think it's harmless
[00:37.54]You're tearing me apart and
[00:39.80]Girl the hardest part is
[00:41.95]You're so high on attention
[00:44.19]You're taking miles for inches
[00:46.35]Leave me in the darkness
[00:48.08]Never finish what we started
[00:50.48]Girl why you gotta be so heartless
[00:55.08]Why you gotta be so heartless
[01:00.54]Monday night was definitely not our night
[01:02.68]Tuesday night was just another fight
[01:04.83]Wednesday I thought everything would change
[01:07.07]Thursday came and it was still the same
[01:09.15]Friday night we went out on the town
[01:11.32]Saturday we should have burned it down
[01:13.47]Sunday morning came and now you're gone
[01:15.69]I should prolly know this s**t by now
[01:17.61]Ah oh
[01:20.04]I should prolly know this s**t by now
[01:21.90]But no no
[01:25.32]Why you gotta be so heartless
[01:27.31]I know you think it's harmless
[01:29.36]You're tearing me apart and
[01:31.77]Girl the hardest part is
[01:33.78]You're so high on attention
[01:35.98]You're taking miles for inches
[01:38.19]Leave me in the darkness
[01:39.97]Never finish what we started
[01:42.38]Girl why you gotta be so heartless
[01:46.90]Why you gotta be so heartless
[01:51.12]Girl why you gotta be so in between
[01:54.41]Loving me and leaving leaving
[02:00.68]Ah oh
[02:03.02]I should prolly know this s**t by now
[02:05.20]But no no
[02:08.56]Why you gotta be so heartless
[02:10.67]I know you think it's harmless
[02:12.63]You're tearing me apart and
[02:14.84]Girl the hardest part is
[02:16.95]You're so high on attention
[02:19.26]You're taking miles for inches
[02:21.35]Leave me in the darkness
[02:23.22]Never finish what we started
[02:25.53]Girl why you gotta be so heartless
[02:30.17]Why you gotta be so heartless
[02:34.42]Why you gotta be so heartless
[02:38.68]Girl why you gotta be so heartless
data.trans:
[ti:Heartless (Explicit)]
[ar:Diplo/Morgan Wallen]
[al:Heartless (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.43]//
[00:00.86]//
[00:01.30]无情
[00:05.26]如此无情
[00:09.44]你深夜出门
[00:11.59]我一直等着你给我打电话
[00:13.74]这就是你孤单时
[00:15.85]会做的事情
[00:18.03]你总在追寻什么
[00:20.19]但我总是跟不上你的步伐
[00:22.27]我希望我没有改变
[00:24.42]但我知道我会让你
[00:25.92]再赢一次 每当这时
[00:27.85]我都会痛苦不堪
[00:29.48]你不是故意的
[00:30.98]我自己安慰自己
[00:32.98]但你为何要这样无情
[00:35.43]我知道你以为这伤不了人
[00:37.54]可你让我痛不欲生
[00:39.80]姑娘 最痛苦的是
[00:41.95]别人对你的关注 让你忘乎所以
[00:44.19]你得寸进尺了
[00:46.35]把我丢在寒夜里
[00:48.08]有始无终
[00:50.48]姑娘 为何你要如此无情
[00:55.08]为何你要如此无情
[01:00.54]周一晚上肯定是不属于我们的
[01:02.68]周二晚上又要争吵一次
[01:04.83]周三 我还以为会有什么不一样
[01:07.07]周四到来 依然这样
[01:09.15]周五晚上 我们到城里去
[01:11.32]周六 我们应该摧毁了一切
[01:13.47]周日早上到了 而你不见了
[01:15.69]到现在我应该有点自知之明了
[01:17.61]//
[01:20.04]到现在我应该有点自知之明了
[01:21.90]但是
[01:25.32]为何你要如此无情
[01:27.31]我知道你以为这伤不了人
[01:29.36]可你让我痛不欲生
[01:31.77]姑娘 最痛苦的是
[01:33.78]别人对你的关注 让你忘乎所以
[01:35.98]你得寸进尺了
[01:38.19]把我丢在寒夜里
[01:39.97]有始无终
[01:42.38]姑娘 为何你要如此无情
[01:46.90]为何你要如此无情
[01:51.12]姑娘 为何你要如此折磨我
[01:54.41]前一秒爱我 下一秒就离开我
[02:00.68]//
[02:03.02]到现在我应该有点自知之明了
[02:05.20]但是
[02:08.56]为何你要如此无情
[02:10.67]我知道你以为这伤不了人
[02:12.63]可你让我痛不欲生
[02:14.84]姑娘 最痛苦的是
[02:16.95]别人对你的关注 让你忘乎所以
[02:19.26]你得寸进尺了
[02:21.35]把我丢在寒夜里
[02:23.22]有始无终
[02:25.53]姑娘 为何你要如此无情
[02:30.17]为何你要如此无情
[02:34.42]为何你要如此无情
[02:38.68]姑娘 为何你要如此无情
